hints.content:
Mrs. Bain gave away $\goldE{30}$ awards before today.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1ff029e47b3dcd3343e05a1fcbf8382f9b93ef2c)

To add on the number line, we jump to the **right**.

Then she gave away $\maroonD{11}$ spelling awards.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/0b2662131c96d0e21ceb1a84106c8fe15204b3c6)

$\goldE{30} + \maroonD{11} = 41$

Then she gave away $\blueE{36}$ science awards.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9c14cd0f673675e8d3393b2409106f5e6b68a3cb)

$41+  \blueE{36} = 77$

Last, she gave away $\purpleD{18}$ math awards.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/416db8bac4c6725d9728033428b2d5b99fa5c0ba)

$77+\purpleD{18} = 95$

This number line represents how to find the total number of awards Mrs. Bain gave away:

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/73b1023d8c52ca23de0b2a2c782e31d6dcceba2e)

Mrs. Bain gave $95$ total awards.

question.content:
Before today, Mrs. Bain had given a total of $30$ awards.  

Today, Mrs. Bain gave $11$ more spelling awards,  $36$ more science awards, and $18$ more math awards.      

**Which number line shows how to find how many total awards Mrs. Bain has given?**

[[☃ radio 1]]


**How many awards has Mrs. Bain now given?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] awards
